footer.riskDisclaimer: Trading is risky & most day traders lose money. This site & the products & services FibAlgo offers are for informational & educational purposes only. All content is to be considered hypothetical, selected after the fact, in order to demonstrate our product and should not be construed as financial advice. Decisions to buy, sell, hold or trade in securities, commodities and other investments involve risk and are best made based on the advice of qualified financial professionals. Past performance does not guarantee future results. Hypothetical or Simulated performance results have certain limitations, unlike an actual performance record, simulated results do not represent actual trading.

indicatorTabs.liveChartDesc: What you see below is not a mockup or a demo â€” these are live charts running our actual indicators on real market data. We believe in radical transparency: every signal, every zone, every level you see is exactly what our subscribers see. No cherry-picked screenshots, no hindsight edits. pez.0: Adaptive brain: statistically relevant Fibonacci levels for current market
pez.1: Dynamic S/R zones that flip from resistance to support on break
pez.2: Perfect Time Zones: Fibonacci-based volatility and reversal timing
pez.3: Market Pressure Gauge: real-time buy vs sell momentum
pez.4: Confidence % per zone for statistical significance

prz.0: Dual-pivot engine: major trend + minor retracement pivots
prz.1: Adaptive Fibonacci with statistically-proven Confidence Zones
prz.2: Deep statistical data: success rate and breakout probability per level
prz.3: Market Pressure Gauge between major pivots

screener.0: Up to 10 symbols and timeframes in one table
screener.1: Volatility (ATR), Trend, Fib Range, Trend Strength columns
screener.2: Buy Zone / Sell Zone: shows Active when price is inside a PEZ
screener.3: Scan for confluence: Trend + Strength + Zone alignment
screener.4: Companion to Perfect Entry Zoneâ„¢ for detailed chart analysis

smartTrading.0: Volatility-adjusted S/R levels (ATR buffer) to reduce false breaks
smartTrading.1: Strength-rated breakouts: Strong Break, Break, or Low Break
smartTrading.2: Reversal Zones (Teal/Maroon) for second-chance entries after breakout
smartTrading.3: Dynamic Take Profit zones that move with the trend
smartTrading.4: Clear systematic approach for breakouts and retests

oscillator.0: Statistical brain: which oscillator values led to reversals historically
oscillator.1: 6 core oscillators: RSI, MFI, Momentum, Stochastic, Stoch RSI, Chaikin
oscillator.2: Dynamic overbought/oversold bands (Maroon peak, Teal trough zones)
oscillator.3: Analysis table: Zone, Count, Conf%, Avg Drop/Rise%, Avg Time
oscillator.4: Data Decay Engine: more weight to recent market behavior

technicalAnalysis.2: Predictive tools: AI Price Forecast, Adaptive Trend Finder, probabilistic highs/lows

about.title: Building the Future of AI Trading
about.metaTitle: About Us â€“ Our Mission & Story
about.metaDescription: Learn about FibAlgo â€“ AI-powered trading indicators trusted by 10,000+ traders worldwide. Our mission is to make trading fairer, clearer, and accessible.
about.metaOgTitle: About FibAlgo â€“ AI Trading Platform
about.metaOgDescription: Our mission is to make trading fairer and clearer with AI-powered indicators.
about.metaTwitterTitle: About FibAlgo â€“ AI Trading Platform
about.metaTwitterDescription: Our mission is to make trading fairer and clearer with AI-powered indicators.
about.subtitle: Empowering traders worldwide with AI-powered indicators that deliver clear, reliable, and noise-free signals.
about.storyP1: After 10+ years of trading, we saw most forex indicators were outdated, unreliable, and designed to sell dreams. Markets evolved with algorithmic dominance and smart money strategies â€” but retail tools didn't. So we built FibAlgo: AI-powered indicators that combine institutional concepts like order blocks, liquidity sweeps, and smart money flow with real-time data analysis.
about.storyP2: The result: AI-powered signals that are clear, reliable, and built for today's markets. No noise, no false signals â€” just data-driven trading tools that help you make smarter decisions.
about.whySubtitle: Banks and institutions drive the markets. Our AI helps you spot their moves before they happen.
about.why1Body: With transparent backtests, live insights, and a growing community of 10,000+ traders worldwide, FibAlgo is built on trust and results.
about.why2Body: Trading is tough, and most tools make it harder. We built FibAlgo to level the playing field â€” giving every trader access to institutional-grade AI analysis.
about.why3Body: Our AI doesn't just follow price â€” it reads the market's structure, detects smart money movements, and delivers precise signals you can trust.
about.ctaSubtitle: Join 10,000+ traders who trust FibAlgo for their trading decisions.

library.metaTitle: Indicator Library â€“ AI Trading Indicators

library.metaOgDescription: Browse our complete collection of AI trading indicators for TradingView.
library.title: FibAlgo Indicator Library
library.subtitle: Complete guide to FibAlgo's AI-powered trading indicators. Learn setup, configuration, and strategies.
library.heroDesc: Complete guide to FibAlgo indicators. Learn setup, configuration, and trading strategies.
library.ctaSubtitle: Join 10,000+ traders using FibAlgo's AI-powered indicators on TradingView.
library.step1Desc: Select Basic, Premium, or Ultimate based on your trading needs.
library.step2Desc: Sign up and complete your subscription. Access is granted automatically.
library.step3Desc: Ultimate plan users get TradingView indicators automatically. Check Invite-Only Scripts.

gettingAccess.title: Getting Access
gettingAccess.subtitle: Get Started with FibAlgo in 3 Simple Steps
gettingAccess.step1Desc: Visit our pricing page to explore available subscription options. Select the plan that best fits your trading needs.
gettingAccess.step2Desc: Click "Subscribe Now" on your chosen plan. Complete the signup process and payment. Your account will be activated automatically - no manual setup required.
gettingAccess.step3Desc: Access the features included in your plan. For TradingView indicator access, go to Indicators then Invite-Only Scripts to find them.

setupWebsite.title: Setup Indicators (Website)
setupWebsite.subtitle: Enable FibAlgo indicators on TradingView desktop
setupWebsite.step1Desc: After subscribing to any FibAlgo plan, go to TradingView and launch any chart.
setupWebsite.step2Desc: Click the "Indicators" tab at the top of the chart.
setupWebsite.step3Desc: Click the "Invite-only Scripts" section in the indicators panel.
setupWebsite.step4Desc: You now have access to all of the FibAlgo Premium Indicators. To add them to your chart, simply click the indicator you would like to use.
setupWebsite.step4Warning: Free TradingView users are only allowed to have a maximum of 3 indicators on their chart at once.

setupMobile.title: Set Up FibAlgo (Mobile)
setupMobile.subtitle: Access your indicators inside the TradingView mobile app
setupMobile.step1Desc: Launch the TradingView app on your mobile device and open up any chart.
setupMobile.step2Desc: Click the "Settings" button on the bottom of your screen.
setupMobile.step5Desc: You now have access to all of the FibAlgo Premium Indicators. Tap the indicator you would like to use.
setupMobile.step5Warning: Free TradingView users are only allowed to have a maximum of 2 indicators on their chart at once on mobile.

desktopNotifications.title: Set Up Desktop Notifications
desktopNotifications.subtitle: Configure alerts for TradingView desktop
desktopNotifications.step1Desc: Make sure the indicator you want to receive alerts from is on your chart.
desktopNotifications.step2Desc: Go to the settings of the indicator for which you want to create an alert.
desktopNotifications.step3Desc: You can select the signal you want to alert in this section. Please note that the signals you select in this settings section will only be sent as alerts.
desktopNotifications.step4Desc: After selecting the desired signals, press the 'OK' button to save these settings.
desktopNotifications.step5Desc: Click on the indicator and click the '...' icon.
desktopNotifications.step7Desc: You can customize your alert settings here according to your preferences.
desktopNotifications.step8Desc: Click "Create Alert" to finalize and activate your notification.

mobileNotifications.title: Set Up Mobile Notifications
mobileNotifications.subtitle: Configure alerts for TradingView mobile app
mobileNotifications.step1Desc: Make sure the indicator you want to receive alerts from is on your chart.
mobileNotifications.step2Desc: Go to the settings of the indicator for which you want to create an alert.
mobileNotifications.step3Desc: You can select the signal you want to alert in this section. Please note that the signals you select in this settings section will only be sent as alerts.
mobileNotifications.step4Desc: After selecting the desired signals, press the 'OK' button to save these settings.
mobileNotifications.step5Desc: Tap on the indicator and tap the '...' icon.
mobileNotifications.step7Desc: You can customize your alert settings here according to your preferences.
mobileNotifications.step8Desc: Tap "Create Alert" to finalize and activate your notification.

library.ssrGettingAccessDesc: Choose your plan and sign up to get instant access to FibAlgo indicators on TradingView.

library.ssrPezDesc: AI-powered indicator that identifies optimal trade entry points with high-probability buy and sell zones.
library.ssrPrzDesc: Advanced Fibonacci retracement indicator with dynamic support and resistance levels.
library.ssrScreenerDesc: Multi-asset screener that scans markets for Perfect Entry Zone signals across multiple timeframes.
library.ssrSmartTradingDesc: Intelligent trading system with automated risk management and position sizing recommendations.
library.ssrOscillatorDesc: Multi-oscillator dashboard combining RSI, MACD, Stochastic, and proprietary momentum analysis.
library.ssrTaDesc: Comprehensive technical analysis overlay with trend lines, patterns, and key levels detection.

pez.subtitle: Adaptive Fibonacci System with Dynamic S/R Zones
pez.overview: FibAlgoÂ® - Perfect Entry Zoneâ„¢ is a comprehensive, multi-layered technical analysis tool designed to give traders a definitive edge in the market. It goes beyond simple indicators by combining four powerful systems into one cohesive interface.
pez.featureAdaptiveDesc: Instead of using fixed settings, its "brain" analyzes historical price action to find the most statistically relevant Fibonacci levels for the current market conditions.
pez.featureDynamicSRDesc: Visually identifies "Perfect Entry Zones" that dynamically flip from resistance to support (and vice-versa) based on price breakthroughs.
pez.featureTimeZonesDesc: Using the Fibonacci sequence, projects future time zones where market volatility and potential trend reversals are more likely to occur.
pez.featurePressureDesc: Real-time visualization of buying versus selling power, measuring the underlying momentum and potential exhaustion points.
pez.conceptAdaptiveDesc: This is the indicator's most powerful feature. Most indicators use a fixed lookback period (e.g., "14" or "50"), which may not be suitable for all market conditions. FibAlgo's adaptive system intelligently tests numerous lookback periods to identify which one has historically predicted market reversals with the highest accuracy.
pez.conceptFlipUptrend: The indicator first identifies a potential resistance area as a RED BOX. If the price breaks decisively through this red zone, the trend is confirmed as strong. The indicator then "flips" this box's color to GREEN. This former resistance has now become a new support level, presenting a potential long entry opportunity on a retest.
pez.conceptFlipDowntrend: A potential support area first appears as a GREEN BOX. If the price breaks down through this green zone, the bearish trend is strong. The indicator flips the box to RED, turning the old support into new resistance.
pez.conceptConfidenceDesc: Each "Perfect Entry Zone" comes with a Confidence percentage. This score answers a simple question: "Historically, how often has the market reacted to this specific price area?" A higher percentage indicates that the zone is more statistically significant.
pez.buySignalsDesc: During an uptrend, watch for the price to break above and close through a RED (Resistance) Zone. The indicator will then flip this zone to GREEN (Support). The primary long entry signal occurs when the price pulls back to retest this newly formed GREEN zone.
pez.sellSignalsDesc: During a downtrend, watch for the price to break below and close through a GREEN (Support) Zone. The indicator will flip this zone to RED (Resistance). The primary short entry signal occurs when the price pulls back to retest this newly formed RED zone.
pez.fibPeriodDesc: Controls pivot detection sensitivity. Higher = major trends, lower = short-term swings. Uses Fibonacci numbers (21, 34, 55, 89, 144).
pez.fibAnalysisSetDesc: Pre-configured Fibonacci level combinations. SET1: Classic, SET2: Advanced Harmonic, SET3: Extended, SET4: Precision.
pez.enableAdaptiveSRDesc: When enabled, the "brain" automatically finds the optimal lookback period by testing multiple values.
pez.manualSRLookbackDesc: Fixed lookback period when Adaptive mode is OFF. Use Fibonacci numbers for best results.
pez.minSRLookbackDesc: Minimum lookback period the adaptive system will test. Lower = faster signals.
pez.maxSRLookbackDesc: Maximum lookback period the adaptive system will test. Higher = more reliable signals.
pez.showTimeZoneDesc: Display Fibonacci Time Zone backgrounds on chart.
pez.manualTimeLookbackDesc: Fixed time lookback when adaptive is OFF.
pez.minMaxTimeLookbackDesc: Range for adaptive time system testing.
pez.fontSizesDesc: Fibonacci values and label font sizes.
pez.showPivotFibValuesDesc: Display calculated Fibonacci values at each pivot.
pez.zoneStatesDesc: The indicator tracks three distinct states for each zone:

prz.subtitle: Next-Generation Fibonacci Trading with Statistical Confidence
prz.overview: FibAlgoÂ® - Perfect Retracement Zoneâ„¢ is a next-generation Fibonacci trading tool that moves beyond static, arbitrary lines to deliver a smarter, data-driven analysis of market retracements. It is built on a powerful dual-pivot engine that precisely identifies both major market trends and the minor retracements within them.
prz.featureDualPivotDesc: Precisely identifies both major market trends and the minor retracements within them using two distinct pivot detection systems.
prz.featureAdaptiveFibDesc: Analyzes the asset's unique price history to identify statistically-proven Confidence Zones where reversals are most likely to occur.
prz.featureDeepStatsDesc: Every Fibonacci zone is enriched with historical success rate and breakout probability of that specific level.
prz.featurePressureDesc: Real-time confirmation of buying or selling strength positioned between major pivots.
prz.coreEngineTitle: The Core Engine: A Dual Pivot System
prz.majorTrendPivotsDesc: Controlled by the "Major Trend Period," this system identifies the significant market highs and lows. These pivots establish the primary trend direction and are labeled as A-series (for downtrends) or B-series (for uptrends).
prz.retracementPivotsDesc: Controlled by the "Retracement Period," this system detects smaller, minor pivots that occur within the major trend. These are the crucial pullbacks and bounces that form the basis for Fibonacci retracement calculations.
prz.noiseZonesDesc: Statistically less significant areas where reversals are less common.
prz.confidenceZonesDesc: High-probability zones where, historically, the most successful reversals have occurred.
prz.pivotLabelsDesc: Major pivots labeled A-1, B-1, etc. Retracement pivots labeled with Fibonacci level.
prz.starSystemDesc: A star signifies a historically successful and powerful retracement level.
prz.fibBoxesDesc: Colored boxes with Total count, Conf%, and Star Conf% for each zone.
prz.longStep1: Confirm the indicator is in a B-series uptrend
prz.longStep2: Wait for price to pull back into a high-probability support area (CZ1, CZ2, CZ3)
prz.longStep3: Watch the Market Pressure Gauge move into the green
prz.shortStep1: Confirm the indicator is in an A-series downtrend
prz.shortStep2: Wait for price to rally into a high-probability resistance area
prz.shortStep3: Watch the Market Pressure Gauge move into the red
prz.majorTrendPeriodDesc: Controls the detection of significant market highs/lows. Higher values identify longer-term trends (A-series/B-series pivots).
prz.retracementPeriodDesc: Detects smaller pullbacks and bounces within the major trend. Lower values = more sensitive retracement detection.
prz.enableAdaptiveFibDesc: When enabled, dynamically calculates optimal Fibonacci zones based on historical data.
prz.noiseZone1Desc: Size of the first noise zone (NZ1) - statistically less significant area.
prz.noiseZone2Desc: Size of the second noise zone (NZ2).
prz.confidenceZone123Desc: Size of high-probability reversal zones (CZ1, CZ2, CZ3).
prz.showPressureGaugeDesc: Toggle the real-time buying/selling pressure visualization.
prz.gaugeDistanceDesc: Vertical offset of the gauge from current price.
prz.showPivotLabelsDesc: Display A-1, B-1 labels at major pivots.
prz.showFibBoxesDesc: Display colored zone boxes with statistics.
prz.adaptiveBrainDesc: The indicator maintains comprehensive statistical tracking for both A-series and B-series:
prz.fibCountsDesc: Total retracements at each Fibonacci level

screener.subtitle: Multi-Symbol Dashboard for Perfect Entry Zone Analysis
screener.overview: The FibAlgoÂ® - Screener (PEZ) is a powerful multi-symbol dashboard that works as a companion to our main FibAlgoÂ® - Perfect Entry Zoneâ„¢ indicator. Instead of analyzing one chart at a time, the screener allows you to monitor up to 10 different symbols and timeframes simultaneously from a single, organized table on your chart.
screener.volatilityDesc: Measures current market energy based on ATR. Categorized as "Low," "Moderate," or "High."
screener.fibRangeDesc: Current price location within the Fibonacci structure calculated by the PEZ engine.
screener.trendStrengthDesc: Calculated using ADX. Below 25: Weak trend. Above 50: Very strong trend.
screener.buyZoneSellZoneDesc: Most critical column! Shows "Active" when price is inside a Perfect Entry Zone.
screener.step1Desc: Go into settings and populate the "Symbol List" with up to 10 symbols. Assign timeframe for each.
screener.step2Desc: Look for multiple columns aligning: Trend "Bullish" + Trend Strength > 25% + Buy Zone "Active"
screener.step3Desc: Open the symbol's chart and apply Perfect Entry Zoneâ„¢ for detailed analysis.

smartTrading.subtitle: Intelligent Trading System with Volatility-Adjusted Levels
smartTrading.overview: FibAlgoÂ® - Smart Tradingâ„¢ is an all-in-one, intelligent trading system designed to provide a clear and systematic approach to navigating the markets. It is engineered to filter out market noise, identify high-probability breakout opportunities, and provide dynamic profit targets that adapt to the trend's momentum.
smartTrading.featureVolatilityDesc: Creates a "buffer zone" around support/resistance levels using ATR, significantly reducing fake signals.
smartTrading.featureBreakoutDesc: Classifies breakouts as "Strong Break," "Break," or "Low Break" based on volatility during the break.
smartTrading.featureReversalDesc: "Second Chance" re-entry zones (Teal for Buy, Maroon for Sell) appear after breakouts for missed entries.
smartTrading.featureTPDesc: Gray TP zones move and expand with the trend, allowing you to stay in winning trades longer.
smartTrading.strongBreakDesc: Very high volatility. Highest quality signal with strong conviction.
smartTrading.lowBreakDesc: Low volatility. Signal suggests caution, may lack follow-through.
smartTrading.buyStep1: Wait for "Break" or "Strong Break" above maroon resistance
smartTrading.buyStep2: For conservative entry, wait for retest of Teal Reversal Zone
smartTrading.buyStep3: Take profits when price enters gray TP Zone
smartTrading.sellStep1: Wait for "Break" or "Strong Break" below teal support
smartTrading.sellStep2: For conservative entry, wait for retest of Maroon Reversal Zone
smartTrading.sellStep3: Take profits when price enters gray TP Zone
smartTrading.fakeTrendBreakDesc: ATR scaling for volatility-buffered S/R lines AND breakout strength classification. Higher = wider buffer, fewer signals but stronger. Lower = earlier signals but more fakeouts. Practical: 0.8-1.2 core, 0.5-0.7 aggressive scalping, 1.3-1.6 conservative swing.
smartTrading.volatilitySensitivityDesc: Supertrend band width multiplier (uses ATR). Higher = wider bands, fewer trend flips, higher confidence but later signals. Typical: 2.5-3.5 default, 2.0 or lower for fast scalping, 3.5-4.5 for choppy markets.
smartTrading.strongBreakCondition: Current ATR exceeds 1.4Ã— of 50-period rolling average. High conviction signal.
smartTrading.breakCondition: ATR within normal range. Standard reliable signal.
smartTrading.lowBreakCondition: ATR below 0.7Ã— of average. Caution - may lack follow-through.
smartTrading.useHTFTrendDesc: Filter signals to only show those aligned with higher timeframe trend.
smartTrading.htfResolutionDesc: Higher timeframe to use for trend direction filter.
smartTrading.htfVolatilityDesc: Supertrend multiplier for the HTF trend calculation.
smartTrading.showHTFTrendLabelDesc: Display current HTF trend direction on chart.
smartTrading.showReversalZoneDesc: Toggle visibility of retracement re-entry zones.
smartTrading.showTPZoneDesc: Toggle visibility of take profit zones.
smartTrading.reversalBoxStartedDesc: Alert when new reversal zone forms.

oscillatorMatrix.subtitle: Statistical Oscillator Analysis with Dynamic Zones
oscillatorMatrix.overview: FibAlgoÂ® - Oscillator Matrixâ„¢ is a next-generation statistical tool that revolutionizes how traders use oscillators. It analyzes hundreds of past price tops and bottoms to discover which oscillator values have actually led to reversals, then visualizes them as dynamic, data-driven zones.
oscillatorMatrix.featureStatBrainDesc: Learns from the market by recording oscillator values at every identified pivot point, then groups findings into statistically significant categories.
oscillatorMatrix.featureCoreOscDesc: RSI, MFI, Momentum, Stochastic, Stochastic RSI, and Chaikin Money Flow. The entire statistical engine adapts to your preferred tool.
oscillatorMatrix.featureAnalysisTableDesc: Detailed dashboard showing Zone, Count, Conf%, Avg Drop%/Rise%, and Avg Time for every identified zone.
oscillatorMatrix.featureDataDecayDesc: Adaptive feature that gives more weight to recent market behavior for relevant analysis.
oscillatorMatrix.maroonBandDesc: Highlights oscillator range where price peaks have historically occurred most often. Your dynamic overbought/resistance zone.
oscillatorMatrix.tealBandDesc: Highlights range where price troughs have occurred most often. Your dynamic oversold/support zone.
oscillatorMatrix.sellStep1: Look for oscillator to enter Maroon Band
oscillatorMatrix.sellStep2: Check Analysis Table for high Conf% and Avg Drop%
oscillatorMatrix.sellStep3: This provides strong confirmation for potential short
oscillatorMatrix.buyStep1: Look for oscillator to enter Teal Band
oscillatorMatrix.buyStep2: Check Analysis Table for high Conf% and Avg Rise%
oscillatorMatrix.buyStep3: This provides data-backed evidence for potential long
oscillatorMatrix.oscRSIDesc: Most popular momentum oscillator. Measures speed and magnitude of price changes. Range: 0-100.
oscillatorMatrix.oscMFIDesc: Volume-weighted RSI. Incorporates both price and volume data. Range: 0-100.
oscillatorMatrix.oscMomentumDesc: Measures rate of price change. Simple difference between current and past price.
oscillatorMatrix.oscStochasticDesc: Compares closing price to high-low range. Shows position within recent range. Range: 0-100.
oscillatorMatrix.oscStochRSIDesc: Stochastic applied to RSI values. More sensitive than regular Stochastic. Range: 0-100.
oscillatorMatrix.oscCMFDesc: Measures accumulation/distribution over a period. Range: -1 to +1 (normalized to 0-100).
oscillatorMatrix.algoPHPLDesc: How sensitive the algorithm is to price changes. Lower = more frequent signals, Higher = fewer but stronger signals.
oscillatorMatrix.algoLookbackDesc: How many past price turning points to analyze. More data = more reliable statistics but slower updates.
oscillatorMatrix.algoPerfDesc: Track actual performance (price movement) after each signal.
oscillatorMatrix.algoBarsDesc: How far ahead to measure price movement after signals. Higher = longer-term performance tracking.
oscillatorMatrix.algoDecayDesc: Weight recent data more heavily than older data for adaptive analysis.
oscillatorMatrix.algoDecayRateDesc: How much to favor recent data. Higher = recent signals matter more (0.9-0.99 recommended).
oscillatorMatrix.rsiSmoothingDesc: Apply additional smoothing to RSI line.
oscillatorMatrix.rsiBBStdDevDesc: Standard deviation for BB when "SMA + BB" smoothing selected.
oscillatorMatrix.tableShowDesc: Display the statistical analysis matrix table.
oscillatorMatrix.tableSizeDesc: Size of the analysis table display.
oscillatorMatrix.algoStep1Desc: Uses ZigZag algorithm (on close price) to identify significant highs (PH) and lows (PL).
oscillatorMatrix.algoStep2Desc: At each pivot, records the oscillator value into phRSI_values or plRSI_values arrays.
oscillatorMatrix.algoStep3Desc: Groups oscillator values into categories (e.g., 0-10, 10-20, etc.) using CategoryData UDT.
oscillatorMatrix.algoStep4Desc: Applies decay rate to weight recent pivots more heavily than older ones.
oscillatorMatrix.algoStep5Desc: Finds the most frequent category (mode) for peaks and troughs to determine band placement.
oscillatorMatrix.algoStep6Desc: Draws Maroon band at peak mode range, Teal band at trough mode range.

technicalAnalysis.subtitle: AI-Powered All-in-One Trading Suite
technicalAnalysis.overview: FibAlgoÂ® - Technical Analysisâ„¢ is not just an indicator; it is a complete, AI-powered trading suite designed to be the ultimate all-in-one analysis toolkit. It consolidates dozens of powerful trading concepts into a single, cohesive, and highly customizable interface.
technicalAnalysis.moduleAIDashDesc: Real-time summary of dozens of classic indicators organized into Trend, Momentum, Pressure, and Volume categories. Includes unique Fear & Greed meter.
technicalAnalysis.moduleSMCDesc: Auto-detects Break of Structure (BOS), Change of Character (CHOCH), Order Blocks, Fair Value Gaps (FVG), and ICT Killzones (Asia, London, New York).
technicalAnalysis.modulePredictiveDesc: AI Price Forecast analyzes historical data to project future price paths. Adaptive Trend Finder finds statistically relevant trends. Probabilistic Highs & Lows with AI-Threshold.
technicalAnalysis.moduleFibDesc: Auto-draws Fibonacci Retracement/Extension levels, Time Zones, and significant horizontal Support/Resistance levels.
technicalAnalysis.moduleRSIDesc: Uses AI-supported calculations to create dynamic bands that adapt to current market conditions instead of fixed 70/30 levels.
technicalAnalysis.moduleConfigDesc: Enable only the tools you need via the master switchboard settings panel. Combine any modules to create your custom trading system.
technicalAnalysis.featKillzoneDesc: Highlight trading session times (Asia, London, New York) with timezone selection (GMT-12 to GMT+14).
technicalAnalysis.featDailyBiasDesc: The daily bias refers to overall sentiment or direction expected within a trading day.
technicalAnalysis.featFibLevelsDesc: Auto-draw Fibonacci retracements and extensions. Options: Pivot Points, Retracements, Extensions, or combinations.
technicalAnalysis.featSMCDesc: Auto-detect BOS, CHOCH, Order Blocks, FVG - combination of key level strategy with market structure.
technicalAnalysis.featForecastDesc: AI-powered price prediction by analyzing backtest data. Engine options: ChatGPT or Gemini.
technicalAnalysis.featTADesc: Instant price analysis dashboard using multiple indicators. Toggle "Simple" for minimal view.
technicalAnalysis.featHighLowDesc: Shows percentage probability that highs/lows will return based on trend strength.
technicalAnalysis.featAIThresholdDesc: AI-calculated threshold levels for probabilistic analysis.
technicalAnalysis.featSRDesc: Auto-draw significant horizontal S/R levels. Line styles: Solid, Dotted, Dashed.
technicalAnalysis.featTrendFinderDesc: AI-powered current trend identification and tracking.
technicalAnalysis.featRSIDesc: AI-enhanced RSI with dynamic overbought/oversold bands instead of fixed 70/30.
technicalAnalysis.fibTimeZonesDesc: Vertical time projections based on Fibonacci numbers.
technicalAnalysis.alertFibLevelsDesc: Alert when price crosses any Fibonacci level.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.metaDescription: Read FibAlgo's privacy policy. Learn how we collect, use, and protect your personal data when using our AI trading platform.
privacyPolicy.metaOgDescription: Learn how FibAlgo collects, uses, and protects your personal data.
privacyPolicy.intro: This Privacy Policy describes how your personal information is collected, used, and shared when you visit or make a purchase from FibAlgo.com (the "Site").

personalInfo.title: Personal Information We Collect
personalInfo.body: When you visit the Site, we automatically collect certain information about your device, including information about your web browser, IP address, time zone, and some of the cookies that are installed on your device. Additionally, as you browse the Site, we collect information about the individual web pages or products that you view, what websites or search terms referred you to the Site, and information about how you interact with the Site. We refer to this automatically-collected information as "Device Information".

technologies.title: We Collect Device Information Using the Following Technologies

cookies.label: "Cookies"
cookies.bodyBeforeLink: are data files that are placed on your device or computer and often include an anonymous unique identifier. For more information about cookies, and how to disable cookies, visit

logFiles.label: "Log files"
logFiles.body: track actions occurring on the Site, and collect data including your IP address, browser type, Internet service provider, referring/exit pages, and date/time stamps.

webBeacons.label: "Web beacons", "tags", and "pixels"
webBeacons.body: are electronic files used to record information about how you browse the Site.

technologies.orderInfo: Additionally when you make a purchase or attempt to make a purchase through the Site, we collect certain information from you, including your name, payment information (including credit card numbers, email address, and phone number). We refer to this information as "Order Information".
technologies.personalInfoNote: When we talk about "Personal Information" in this Privacy Policy, we are talking both about Device Information and Order Information.

usePersonalInfo.title: How Do We Use Your Personal Information?
usePersonalInfo.orderInfo: We use the Order Information that we collect generally to fulfill any orders placed through the Site.
usePersonalInfo.orderInfoListIntro: Additionally, we use this Order Information to:

orderInfoList.1: Screen our orders for potential risk or fraud;
orderInfoList.2: When in line with the preferences you have shared with us, provide you with information or advertising relating to our products or services;
orderInfoList.3: Display information using third party apps on our website;
orderInfoList.4: Set up your accounts with our products.

usePersonalInfo.deviceInfo: We use the Device Information that we collect to help us screen for potential risk and fraud (in particular, your IP address), and more generally to improve and optimize our Site (for example, by generating analytics about how our customers browse and interact with the Site, and to assess the success of our marketing and advertising campaigns).

sharing.title: Sharing Your Personal Information
sharing.intro: We share your Personal Information with third parties to help us use your Personal Information, as described above.
sharing.googleIntro: We also use Google Analytics to help us understand how our customers use the Site â€” you can read more about how Google uses your Personal Information here:
sharing.googleMiddle: . You can also opt-out of Google Analytics here:
sharing.compliance: Finally, we may also share your Personal Information to comply with applicable laws and regulations, to respond to a subpoena, search warrant or other lawful request for information we receive, or to otherwise protect our rights.

doNotTrack.title: Do Not Track
doNotTrack.body: Please note that we do not alter our Site's data collection and use practices when we see a Do Not Track signal from your browser.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.body1: If you are a European resident, you have the right to access personal information we hold about you and to ask that your personal information be corrected, updated, or deleted. If you would like to exercise this right, please contact us through the contact information below.
rights.body2: Additionally, if you are a European resident we note that we are processing your information in order to fulfill contracts we might have with you (for example if you make an order through the Site), or otherwise to pursue our legitimate business interests listed above.
rights.body3: Additionally, please note that your information will be transferred outside of Europe, including to Canada and the United States.

dataRetention.title: Data Retention
dataRetention.body: When you place an order through the Site, we will maintain your Order Information for our records unless and until you ask us to delete this information.

changes.title: Changes
changes.body: We may update this privacy policy from time to time in order to reflect, for example, changes to our practices or for other operational, legal or regulatory reasons. The updated version will be indicated by an updated "Revised" date and the updated version will be effective as soon as it is accessible. If we make material changes to this privacy notice, we may notify you either by prominently posting a notice of such changes or by directly sending you a notification. We encourage you to review this privacy notice frequently to be informed of how we are protecting your information.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.bodyBeforeEmail: For more information about our privacy practices, if you have questions, or if you would like to make a complaint, please contact us by email at

termsOfService.title: Terms of Service
termsOfService.metaDescription: Read FibAlgo's terms of service. Understand the terms and conditions for using our AI trading indicators and platform.
termsOfService.metaOgDescription: Read the terms and conditions for using FibAlgo AI trading indicators and platform.

overview.title: Overview
overview.body1: This website is operated by MAC FINANCE SOFTWARE TECHNOLOGIES, LTD, doing business as FibAlgo. Throughout the site, the terms "we", "us" and "our" refer to FibAlgo. FibAlgo offers this website, including all information, tools and services available from this site to you, the user, conditioned upon your acceptance of all terms, conditions, policies and notices stated here.
overview.body2: By visiting our site and/or purchasing something from us, you are participating in our "Service" and agree to be bound by the following terms and conditions ("Terms of Service", "Terms"), including any additional terms and conditions and policies referenced herein and/or available via hyperlink. These Terms of Service apply to all users of the site, including but not limited to browsers, vendors, customers, merchants and/or content contributors.
overview.body3: Please read these Terms of Service carefully before accessing or using our website. By accessing or using any part of the site, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to all the terms and conditions of this agreement, you may not access the website or use any services.

onlineStore.title: Online Store Terms
onlineStore.body1: By agreeing to these Terms of Service, you represent that you are at least the age of majority in your state or province of residence, or that you are the age of majority in your state or province of residence and you have given us your consent to allow any of your minor dependents to use this site.
onlineStore.body2: You may not use our products for any illegal or unauthorized purpose nor may you, in the use of the Service, violate any laws in your jurisdiction (including but not limited to copyright laws).
onlineStore.body3: You must not transmit any worms or viruses or any code of a destructive nature.
onlineStore.body4: A breach or violation of any of the Terms will result in an immediate termination of your Services.

generalConditions.title: General Conditions
generalConditions.body1: We reserve the right to refuse service to anyone for any reason at any time.
generalConditions.body2: You understand that your content (not including credit card information), may be transferred unencrypted and involve (a) transmissions over various networks; and (b) changes to conform and adapt to technical requirements of connecting networks or devices. Credit card information is always encrypted during transfer over networks.
generalConditions.body3: You agree not to reproduce, duplicate, copy, sell, resell or exploit any portion of the Service, use of the Service, or access to the Service or any contact on the website through which the service is provided, without express written permission by us.

riskDisclaimer.title: Risk Disclaimer
riskDisclaimer.body1: Trading is risky & most day traders lose money. All content is to be considered hypothetical, selected after the fact, in order to demonstrate our product and should not be construed as financial advice. Decisions to buy, sell, hold or trade in securities, commodities and other investments involve risk and are best made based on the advice of qualified financial professionals. Past performance does not guarantee future results.
riskDisclaimer.body2: The risk of loss in trading can be substantial. You should therefore carefully consider whether such trading is suitable for you in light of your financial condition.

hypothetical.title: Hypothetical and Simulated Performance Disclaimer
hypothetical.body: Hypothetical or Simulated performance results have certain limitations, unlike an actual performance record, simulated results do not represent actual trading. Also, since the trades have not been executed, the results may have under-or-over compensated for the impact, if any, of certain market factors, such as lack of liquidity. Simulated trading programs in general are also subject to the fact that they are designed with the benefit of hindsight. No representation is being made that any account will or is likely to achieve profit or losses similar to those shown.

testimonials.title: Testimonials Disclaimer
testimonials.body: Testimonials appearing on this website may not be representative of other clients or customers and is not a guarantee of future performance or success. Any trading results depicted in testimonials are not verified and we have no basis for believing that individual experiences depicted are typical considering that results will vary given many factors such as skill, risk management, experience, and the fact that trading itself is a very high-risk activity where it is easy to lose money.

educational.title: Information and Educational Purposes Only
educational.body1: FibAlgo and the tools provided DO NOT offer or provide personalized investment advice. The tools, browsers, data, content and information provided are not personal and are not customized to meet the investment needs of any individual. Therefore, the tools, browsers, data, content and information are for informational and educational purposes only.
educational.body2: YOU SHOULD NOT RELY ON THE TOOLS, SCANNERS OR THE DATA, CONTENT AND INFORMATION IN THEM AS THE SOLE BASIS FOR AN INVESTMENT DECISION OR TRANSACTION. If you choose to rely on our tools, scanners or such data, content or information, you do so at your own risk and you fully acknowledge, understand and agree that you are solely responsible for your investment research and decisions.

tradingView.title: TradingView Disclosure
tradingView.body1: The charts used on this site are prepared by TradingView, on which our tools are built.
tradingView.body2BeforeLink: TradingViewÂ® is a registered trademark of TradingView, Inc.
tradingView.body2AfterLink: . TradingView has no affiliation with the owner, developer or provider of the products or services described herein, or has any interest, proprietary or otherwise, in any such product or service, nor does it endorse or recommend any such product or service.

refunds.title: Refunds
refunds.body1: We allow refunds within a 3-day period if you are not satisfied or do not understand our services, which means you have 3 days after you sign up to any FibAlgo subscription plan to receive a refund.
refunds.body2BeforeEmail: To get a refund, you can contact us at
refunds.body2AfterEmail: and we will assist you within 12 hours. Refunds generally take 5-7 business days to arrive in your bank account.
refunds.body3: We allow refunds specifically for yearly subscription auto-renewals within the first 72 hours of billing, however, we are not required to process a refund under any other circumstance after 30 days including the case you forgot about auto-renewal of your subscription.
refunds.body4BeforeEmail: We send reminders prior to each billing cycle within the first 30 days, and it is your sole responsibility to manage your subscription prior to renewals by logging in or emailing
refunds.body5: We do not accept refunds when paying with crypto due to potential transaction fees & other complications.

product.title: Product / Service
product.body: Certain products or services may be available exclusively online through the website. We do not warrant that the quality of any products, services, information, or other material purchased or obtained by you will meet your expectations, or that any errors in the Service will be corrected. Imitations of our product are not allowed, you agree that we have the right at anytime to remove your access and ban you from our server if suspected of imitating in any form.

prohibitedUses.title: Prohibited Uses
prohibitedUses.intro: In addition to other prohibitions as set forth in the Terms of Service, you are prohibited from using the site or its content:

list.1: To solicit others to perform or participate in any unlawful acts
list.2: To violate any international, federal, provincial or state regulations, rules, laws, or local ordinances
list.3: To infringe upon or violate our intellectual property rights or the intellectual property rights of others
list.4: To harass, abuse, insult, harm, defame, slander, disparage, intimidate, or discriminate
list.5: To submit false or misleading information
list.6: To upload or transmit viruses or any other type of malicious code
list.7: To collect or track the personal information of others
list.8: To spam, phish, pharm, pretext, spider, crawl, or scrape
list.9: To interfere with or circumvent the security features of the Service

prohibitedUses.outro: We reserve the right to terminate your use of the Service or any related website for violating any of the prohibited uses.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer of Warranties; Limitation of Liability
disclaimer.body1: We do not warrant, represent or undertake that your use of our Service will be uninterrupted, timely, secure or error-free.
disclaimer.body2: We do not guarantee that the results that may be obtained from the use of the Service will be accurate or reliable.
disclaimer.body3: You expressly agree that your use or inability to use the Service is entirely at your own risk. The Service and all products and services made available to you through the Service are provided 'as is' and 'as available' for your use without any representations, warranties or conditions, express or implied.
disclaimer.body4: In no event shall FibAlgo, our directors, officers, employees, affiliates, agents, contractors, interns, suppliers, service providers or licensors be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, punitive, special or consequential damages.

changesToTerms.title: Changes to Terms of Service
changesToTerms.body: We reserve the right, at our sole discretion, to update, change or replace any part of these Terms of Service by posting updates and changes to our website. It is your responsibility to check our website periodically for changes. Your continued use of or access to our website or the Service following the posting of any changes to these Terms of Service constitutes acceptance of those changes.

contactInfo.title: Contact Information
contactInfo.bodyBeforeEmail: Questions about the Terms of Service should be sent to us at

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about FibAlgo and our trading indicators.
faq.q1: What is FibAlgo and how does it work?
faq.a1: FibAlgo is an AI-powered trading indicator suite for TradingView. Our algorithms analyze market data in real-time to provide accurate buy/sell signals, entry zones, and risk management suggestions. Simply add our indicators to your TradingView chart and follow the signals.
faq.q2: Which markets do your indicators support?
faq.a2: Our indicators work on any market available on TradingView including Forex, Cryptocurrencies, Stocks, Commodities, and Indices. The AI adapts to different market conditions and volatility levels automatically.
faq.q3: How accurate are the trading signals?
faq.a3: Our indicators have shown a historical accuracy rate of +55% depending on market conditions and timeframe. However, past performance does not guarantee future results. We recommend using proper risk management and never trading more than you can afford to lose.
faq.q4: Do I need TradingView to use FibAlgo?
faq.a4: Yes, FibAlgo indicators are designed specifically for TradingView. You'll need at least a free TradingView account. For the best experience, we recommend TradingView Pro or higher for multiple indicator access.
faq.q5: What's the difference between Premium and Ultimate plans?
faq.a5: The Premium plan ({premiumPrice}/month) gives you full access to FibAlgo Hub with AI-powered market analysis, real-time news, and signals. The Ultimate plan ({ultimatePrice}/month) includes everything in Premium plus all TradingView indicators and exclusive trading strategies.
faq.q6: Can I cancel my subscription anytime?
faq.a6: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time. You'll retain access until the end of your billing period.
faq.a7: Yes! Our Free plan gives you access to basic signals through our Telegram channel. This lets you experience our signal quality before committing to a paid plan.
faq.a8: All paid members get access to our private Telegram community where you can ask questions and get support from our team and other traders. We also provide email support for technical issues.

features.title: Everything You Need to Trade Like a Pro
features.subtitle: Our suite of AI-powered tools gives you the edge in any market condition. From scalping to swing trading, we've got you covered.
features.smartTradingDesc: Advanced AI algorithms analyze market patterns to provide accurate buy/sell signals in real-time.
features.pezDesc: Identify optimal entry points with precision. Our AI calculates the best zones for maximum profit.
features.scalpRobotDesc: Lightning-fast scalping signals for day traders. Catch every micro-movement in the market.
features.oscillatorDesc: Multi-timeframe oscillator analysis combining RSI, MACD, and proprietary indicators.
features.riskDesc: Built-in stop-loss and take-profit calculations to protect your capital.
features.monitoringDesc: Never miss a trading opportunity. Our AI works around the clock analyzing markets.

trustpilot.title: Trusted by Traders Worldwide
trustpilot.subtitle: See what our customers say about FibAlgo on Trustpilot
trustpilot.seeAll: See all reviews on Trustpilot â†’
trustpilot.review1Text: After trying dozens of indicators over the years, FibAlgo is the first one that actually delivers consistent results. My win rate went from 45% to over 70% in just two months.
trustpilot.review2Text: The auto Fibonacci levels save me so much time. I used to spend 30 minutes drawing levels manually, now FibAlgo does it instantly and more accurately than I ever could.
trustpilot.review3Text: Skeptical at first, but the results speak for themselves. The SMC integration with Fibonacci is genius. Been profitable 8 out of the last 10 weeks.
trustpilot.review4Text: Customer support is exceptional. Had a question about settings at 2am and got a response within an hour. The indicator itself has transformed my trading approach completely.
trustpilot.review5Text: Worth every penny. The multi-timeframe analysis feature alone is worth the subscription. I can now see the bigger picture while trading lower timeframes.
trustpilot.review6Text: Finally an indicator that works on both forex and crypto. Been using it on BTCUSD and EURUSD with great success. The alerts are super accurate.
trustpilot.review7Text: I was losing money consistently before FibAlgo. Now I have a clear system to follow. The support and resistance levels are incredibly precise.
trustpilot.review8Text: The best investment I made for my trading career. Simple to use, powerful results. My account is up 35% since I started using FibAlgo three months ago.

sentiment.scoreDesc: Aggregate market mood from -100 (bearish) to +100 (bullish). Derived from AI analysis of recent news.
sentiment.barDesc: Visual position of the score. Green = bullish, red = bearish, amber = mixed.
sentiment.bullishDesc: Number of news items with bullish AI signal (buy/long). Percentage of total.
sentiment.bearishDesc: Number of news items with bearish AI signal (sell/short).
sentiment.neutralDesc: News with no clear directional signal.
sentiment.impactDesc: Average impact score of news (1â€“10) and count of breaking headlines.

trending.headerDesc: Most frequent terms in recent news. Extracted from AI-analyzed headlines; click to filter news by topic.
trending.rankDesc: Position by mention count. Top 3 often highlighted in cyan.
trending.topicDesc: Single word or ticker. Click to search news feed for this term.
trending.mentionsDesc: How many headlines mention this topic in the selected period.

markets.headerDesc: Single view for Crypto, Forex, Stocks, Commodities and Indices. Live prices and 24h change with sortable columns.
markets.tabsDesc: Switch between Crypto, Forex, Stocks, Commodities and Indices. Each tab shows relevant columns and overview stats.
markets.searchDesc: Search assets by name or symbol. Refresh button fetches latest data from the API.
markets.tableDesc: All assets with price, 24h change, volume and optional 24h range. Click column headers to sort.
markets.sortDesc: Click any column header to sort by that field. Toggle ascending/descending with repeated clicks.
markets.dividerDesc: Drag the divider to change the table vs indicators panel width. Helps focus on data or context.
markets.overviewDesc: Summary stats for the active tab: market cap, volume, dominance (crypto), or key instruments.
markets.fearGreedDesc: Alternative.me Fear & Greed Index (0â€“100). Extreme Fear to Extreme Greed. Shown for Crypto tab only.
markets.topGainersDesc: Assets with highest 24h gain in the current tab. Quick scan for momentum.
markets.topLosersDesc: Assets with largest 24h decline. Useful for risk or mean-reversion ideas.

news.headerDetail: FibAlgo monitors news sources 24/7 and analyzes each story in seconds.
news.titleDetail: Our AI creates a clear, actionable headline that captures the market-moving essence.
news.signalDetail: The AI determines whether news is Bullish, Bearish, or Neutral. Conviction shows confidence.
news.aiDetail: Synthesizes news with market data, technical analysis, and historical patterns.
news.positionDetail: AI suggests a specific position: Long or Short, the asset, confidence, and trading style.
news.metricsDetail: Market Impact, Risk Mode, and Info Quality help assess the trade setup.
news.fullbtnDetail: Reveals complete analysis including detailed breakdown and research data.
news.newsAnalysisDetail: Thorough analysis covering implications for different trading styles.
news.keyRiskDetail: The most important risk that could invalidate this trade.
news.researchDetail: AI searched the web for specific data points to inform its decision.
news.assetBtnDetail: Click to instantly open the chart for this asset.

events.headerDetail: Shows the released data compared to forecast and previous values. Green indicates a beat.
events.aiAnalysisDetail: AI instantly interprets the data release and provides actionable market context.
events.urgencyDetail: Urgency shows how quickly you should act. Market Impact indicates potential price movement.
events.scenariosDetail: AI maps 5 possible outcomes from BIG BEAT to BIG MISS with expected market reactions.
events.bullishDetail: Complete trade setup with trigger, entry, stop loss, target, and risk/reward ratio.
events.bearishDetail: Opposite direction trade with specific levels and invalidation conditions.
events.alternativesDetail: Secondary trade ideas based on beat/miss outcomes in correlated markets.
events.implicationsDetail: How the data release affects different asset classes like stocks, dollar, and gold.
events.summaryDetail: Concise summary of the overall market implications and recommended action.
events.liveEventDetail: Events in live window are about to release data. AI is ready to analyze the moment data drops.
events.liveScenariosDetail: AI has pre-analyzed all possible outcomes so you can react instantly when data releases.
events.liveBullishDetail: Trade setup prepared for bullish scenario. Entry, stop, and target levels are pre-calculated.
events.liveBearishDetail: Trade setup prepared for bearish scenario. Ready to execute on miss confirmation.
events.upcomingDetail: Pre-analyzed events with AI-ready trade setups. Click to see scenarios and trade plans.
events.upcomingScenariosDetail: AI maps hawkish vs dovish scenarios and their market implications.
events.upcomingBullishDetail: Complete trade setup if Fed signals pause or rate cuts.
events.upcomingBearishDetail: Trade setup if Fed maintains hawkish stance or surprises with hike.

breaking.breakingDetail: High-impact headlines in real time. AI sentiment (bullish/bearish) and category tags help you act fast.
breaking.timeDetail: NOW and URGENT mark just-released items. Older items show minutes or hours ago.
breaking.sentimentDetail: AI assigns direction from analysis. Green = bullish, red = bearish, gray = neutral.
breaking.headlineDetail: Click a row to open full analysis and chart. Categories: FOMC, CPI, STOCKS, etc.

trading-strategy.title: Trading Strategies
trading-strategy.description: Expert guides on swing trading, day trading, scalping, price action, and more. Learn proven strategies used by professional traders.

technical-analysis.title: Technical Analysis
technical-analysis.description: Master RSI, MACD, Bollinger Bands, moving averages, and advanced technical indicators. Chart analysis guides for all skill levels.

chart-patterns.title: Chart Patterns
chart-patterns.description: Identify head and shoulders, double tops, triangles, flags, and candlestick patterns. Visual pattern recognition for better entries.

crypto.title: Crypto Trading
crypto.description: Bitcoin, Ethereum, altcoin, and DeFi trading strategies. Navigate the crypto market with AI-powered insights and analysis.

forex.title: Forex Trading
forex.description: Forex strategies for EUR/USD, GBP/USD, USD/JPY, and gold. Session-based trading, carry trades, and fundamental analysis.

ai-trading.title: AI & Automated Trading
ai-trading.description: Algorithmic trading, trading bots, backtesting, and machine learning in finance. The future of trading with artificial intelligence.

psychology.title: Trading Psychology
psychology.description: Overcome fear, greed, and emotional trading. Build discipline, manage stress, and develop the mindset of successful traders.

risk-management.title: Risk Management
risk-management.description: Position sizing, stop-loss strategies, portfolio protection, and drawdown management. Preserve your capital like the pros.

options.title: Options Trading
options.description: Covered calls, iron condors, spreads, and options Greeks explained. Strategies for income generation and hedging.

stocks.title: Stock Trading
stocks.description: Penny stocks, blue chips, IPO trading, earnings plays, and sector rotation strategies. Stock market guides for all levels.

defi.title: DeFi & Web3
defi.description: Decentralized finance protocols, yield farming, liquidity pools, and Web3 investment strategies explained simply.

tradingview.title: TradingView Guides
tradingview.description: Pine Script tutorials, TradingView alerts, screeners, chart layouts, and indicator setup guides for the most popular charting platform.

beginner.title: Beginner Trading Guides
beginner.description: Start trading with confidence. Learn the basics of markets, charts, orders, and build your first trading plan step by step.

passive-income.title: Passive Income & Investing
passive-income.description: Dividend investing, copy trading, crypto staking, and long-term wealth building strategies for consistent passive income.

market-analysis.title: Market Analysis
market-analysis.description: Market cycles, economic indicators, sector rotation, and volatility analysis. Understand the bigger picture for better trades.

portfolio.title: Portfolio Management
portfolio.description: Asset allocation, diversification, rebalancing, and modern portfolio theory. Build and manage a winning portfolio.

categories.fallbackDescription: Articles and guides about {category}. Expert insights for traders at all levels.

newsAnalysis.tooltipStrongBuy: Strong buy: AI sees high-confidence long opportunity. Conviction (1â€“10) shows how strongly the model backs this signal.
newsAnalysis.tooltipBuy: Buy: AI suggests a long position. Conviction bar (1â€“10) is the model's confidence in this call.
newsAnalysis.tooltipLeanBuy: Lean buy: weak long bias. Lower conviction; size positions accordingly.
newsAnalysis.tooltipNeutral: Neutral: no clear direction. AI recommends waiting for clearer setup before trading.
newsAnalysis.tooltipLeanSell: Lean sell: weak short bias. Lower conviction; consider smaller size or avoid.
newsAnalysis.tooltipSell: Sell: AI suggests a short position. Conviction (1â€“10) reflects confidence in this signal.
newsAnalysis.tooltipStrongSell: Strong sell: AI sees high-confidence short opportunity. Use conviction score to gauge strength.
newsAnalysis.tooltipScalp: Very short-term trades (seconds to minutes). High frequency, small targets.
newsAnalysis.tooltipDay: Open and close positions within the same day. No overnight hold.
newsAnalysis.tooltipSwing: Hold for days to weeks. Captures larger moves, medium time horizon.
newsAnalysis.tooltipPosition: Long-term positions (weeks to months). Based on trend and fundamentals.
newsAnalysis.tooltipTradeStyle: Trade style suggested by AI for this news.
newsAnalysis.tooltipPubTimeText: When this news was published. Shown as relative time (e.g. 2h ago).
newsAnalysis.tooltipSourceFibAlgo: FibAlgo: our AI-enriched analysis and signal.
newsAnalysis.tooltipSpeedText: Time in seconds from news receipt to AI analysis. Lower is faster.
newsAnalysis.tooltipCategoryText: Asset or theme: crypto, forex, stocks, commodities, indices, or macro. Use filters to narrow the feed.
newsAnalysis.tooltipBreakingText: High-urgency headline; may move markets quickly. Shown at the top of the breaking feed.
newsAnalysis.tooltipHeadlineText: AI summary or original headline. Expand Â«Full AnalysisÂ» below for full text and reasoning.
newsAnalysis.tooltipLowImpactText: AI classified this as low impact: no clear trade opportunity. The conviction bar is indicative only; no position is suggested. Use Â«Full AnalysisÂ» to see why.
newsAnalysis.tooltipAgentQuickReject: AI summary of why this news was not traded. Low-impact items get a short explanation; expand for full reasoning.
newsAnalysis.tooltipAgentNormal: AI overall assessment and suggested positions. Expand Â«Read moreÂ» if the text is long; positions show direction, confidence, and trade style.
newsAnalysis.tooltipFullAnalysisQuickReject: Expand to see full AI analysis, news summary, and why no trade was suggested.
newsAnalysis.tooltipFullAnalysisNormal: Expand to see News Analysis (Stage 1 summary), Key Risk, and Research Data (sources and citations used by AI).
newsAnalysis.tooltipNewsAnalysisQuickReject: Stage 1 AI summary: what the news says and why it was classified as low impact.
newsAnalysis.tooltipNewsAnalysisNormal: Stage 1 AI summary: what the news says and how it was interpreted before deciding on a signal.
newsAnalysis.tooltipTradeStyleText: Trade style: {type}. Time horizon and position sizing are aligned to this style.
newsAnalysis.tooltipRiskOff: Risk-off: investors favor safe havens; volatility and correlations tend to rise.
newsAnalysis.tooltipRiskOn: Risk-on: appetite for risk; equities and risk assets typically perform better.
newsAnalysis.tooltipMarketImpactText: Expected magnitude of price move or volatility from this news. Higher = more actionable for trading.
newsAnalysis.tooltipRiskModeText: Current risk context: NORMAL = standard conditions, ELEVATED = higher uncertainty, HIGH RISK = extreme volatility or event risk.
newsAnalysis.tooltipInfoQualityText: Source reliability: VERIFIED = multiple trusted sources, SPECULATIVE = unconfirmed or single source, RUMOR = low confidence.
newsAnalysis.tooltipKeyRiskText: Main risk identified by AI for this news. Consider before trading.
newsAnalysis.tooltipResearchDataText: Data and citations used by AI (external search, fundamentals). Expand each item to see sources.
newsAnalysis.tooltipChartText: Open chart for {asset} (TradingView format). Click to view price and technicals.
newsAnalysis.tooltipOriginalSourceText: Open the original article or press release in a new tab.
newsAnalysis.noTradeOpportunity: This news does not present actionable trading opportunities.
